title.rendered: Save the Date : 2015 World Forum Convergences

content.rendered:
Save the date : on September 7, 8 and 9, the 8th Convergences World Forum will take place in Paris !

With more than 7 000 participants, 300 speakers from more than 40 different countries, 4 millions people reached through the #Convergences, 50 sessions, 200 media outlets and 45 exhibitors, the 7th Convergences World Forum was a real success.

The 2015 World Forum will be held on September 7 and 8 at the Palais Brongiart and on September 9 at the Paris City Hall. This 8th edition will discuss the new international commitments for development agreed in 2015. The new Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) will be proposed to the United Nations for approval (read the evaluation of the New Development Goals) and Paris will host the 21st Climate Change Conference (COP21) in December.

In this context, we encourage you to get involved in our world forum next September in Paris !
